modal.title: GET THE APP, AND GET ON THE WAITLIST
modal.text: When this drops, you’re going to be right there to catch it. Plus, we’ll plant a tree just for you. Really.
modal.textAbove: Instant spending notifications across all your payment cards

bottomSide.textBig: Lanistar Ltd is a registered EMD agent (FRN: 902996) of Modulr FS Limited and may distribute and redeem e-money and provide payment services. Modulr FS Limited is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority ('FCA') under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900573) for the issuing of electronic money and to provide payment services. Lanistar Limited ('Lanistar') is currently only carrying out pre-launch marketing in preparation for a future launch of Lanistar branded payment cards ('Cards'). Lanistar is finalising arrangements with various partner firms who are authorised and/or regulated (by the FCA and other overseas regulators) and the Cards will only be launched and go-live when those arrangements are in place.

sectionHero.textHero: A polymorphic payment card for those who know influence is the only currency that matters.
sectionHero.text2026: GET THE APP TO GET ON THE WAITLIST.
